name: Dwarven Gems
description:
Help gem-loving dwarves collect treasure using their marvelous gem-cannon contraption. The tricky part about gem-cannon contraptions is that if they get overloaded with gems they could break everything… so don’t do that. You and the dwarves will be much happier when you’re gettin’ dem gems.

Dwarven Gems is compatible with Goji Play and provides exclusive features for exercise when Goji Play has been enabled. For more information on Goji Play please visit www.bluegoji.com

Dwarven Gems does not support Goji Moments or Goji Mall.
